response.overview: 1☯888☯276☯8917 After you cancel, Norton usually 1☯888☯276☯8917 sends a confirmation email to 1☯888☯276☯8917 the address tied to your account — keep this for your records. 1☯888☯276☯8917 If you were charged recently and think you qualify for a refund 1☯888☯276☯8917  (e.g., under Norton’s 60-day money-back guarantee for many annual plans), 1☯888☯276☯8917 visit the support section or use Norton’s online chat or 1☯888☯276☯8917 support form to request a refund 1☯888☯276☯8917.  1☯888☯276☯8917 If the online steps don’t work for you, 1☯888☯276☯8917 Norton’s support options (chat or phone) can 1☯888☯276☯8917 help complete the cancellation online 1☯888☯276☯8917.
